title: BigCoin95

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: From everything said,  I haven't seen anywhere that you mentioned the strategy you said you want to share with the community,  and also,  how can you say you want to share helpful information with us,  but yet ask people to DM and as a newbie, this may not go down well with many people here including myself. What I see here is that you may be trying to use tactics to cajole members here into registering with your link,  and this may not even pay you at the end of the day,  since not everyone who registers with your link will play on those casinos,  and your rewards can only come when those who register with your link have wagering within the month. So you have to find other means if I am not mistaken no one will believe this.

comments.author: BigCoin95

comments.author: BigCoin95

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: So if you have managed to make a risk free infinity money machine, why do you need referral links for pocket money? Or could it be you are fishing here? Random pics or screen grabs are a nice touch but they aren't any kind of proof. I can use inspect element and edit anything on any site in my browser and screengrab it. Anyone can.And even if this was real and you made money with your concept, that just underlines my first question.

comments.body: Quote from: BigCoin95 on November 02, 2023, 12:06:04 AMQuote from: o48o on November 01, 2023, 11:49:57 PMSo if you have managed to make a risk free infinity money machine, why do you need referral links for pocket money? Or could it be you are fishing here? Random pics or screen grabs are a nice touch but they aren't any kind of proof. I can use inspect element and edit anything on any site in my browser and screengrab it. Anyone can.And even if this was real and you made money with your concept, that just underlines my first question.if I get people to sign up who make a volume of 5/10/20K per month without making them lose $1 and earning on top of their bets which bring them earnings thanks to the level up in the VIP club, why not do it?Do you understand me? I hope you do understand that a completely new account offering to share ways to gamble where you are guaranteed to make money is kind of sus right. Especially when its crypto + casino as this space has seen an unbelivable amount of scams and scammers.

If your method would work am certain you will be making millions in no time and don't require nickels and dimes. As you level way faster by yourself. Saying over and over how people can't lose is just lazy scamming.Quote from: BigCoin95 on November 02, 2023, 12:06:04 AMDo you understand me? That's not an issue. I would go with occam's razor on this one and saying you are just a a newb account lying.Imho this thread is a form of begging and against forum rules.

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: So you are saying that the strategy are more geared towards the leveling up of the account and not to make 100% profits? So I hope this strategy does not have a fool proof method to win the house, because sites like this will "restrict" your account, if you constantly win.  A restricted account can also lead to a "locked" account.... as we have seen in some instances that were reported on this forum.. from gamblers winning too much with accounts on those sites.  I know Sports betting on Stake is way more affective to level your account, than say Dice with a 98% win chance.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: I'm gonna call BS on this "strategy", @OP you are not the first person who has offered a "strategy" that is supposedly a "sure win" on this forum. a lot of people have come before you saying they have a sure-win strategy and they have been called out by the forum members just like what is happening right now.I also agree with yahoo62278, if you are making good money with your "strategy" you wouldn't need someone signing up using your referral.
